items.name: Sunshine Burger
items.description: Juicy spicy beef patty, melted cheese, and flavorful toppings create the ultimate cheeseburger delight.

items.name: Overload Burger
items.description: What do you get? Overload Beef Burger!

items.name: Spicy Wings
items.description: Zesty wings with a fiery kick, promise a dance of flavors that'll spice up your taste buds!

items.name: Sandwich
items.description: If you like eating breakfast out of things that could easily be served any time of day, then we have the perfect thing for you.

items.name: Chicken Nuggets
items.description: Dip into delight with our golden Chicken Nuggets—bite-sized happiness for the perfect snack or meal

items.name: Beef Kebabx3
items.description: This trio of Beef Kebabs is a triple delight bound to brighten your day!

items.name: Fry Fries
items.description: If you're a fun-loving foodie, dive into this:New York-style fry fries, adding an extra layer of fun!

items.name: Chicken Popcorn
items.description: Enjoy crispy and flavorful Chicken Popcorn for a tasty treat that satisfies your snack cravings

items.name: Virgin Mojito
items.description: Mint, lime, soda—no rum. Pricey Sprite, but we'll toss in an umbrella, so you don't feel shortchanged

items.name: Strawberry Cooler
items.description: Blend frozen strawberries, and voila—profit! You've aced step 2. Cheers to fruity success!

items.name: Powerhouse Coffee
items.description: Like brandy is distilled wine, this is distilled coffee. Boiled repeatedly, it's potent—guaranteed to make your eyes pop

items.name: Mexican Mocha
items.description: What do you get if you mix spicy Mexican chocolate into coffee? I mean, the answer is pretty much in the name – we really ought to get a better marketing team.

items.name: Chrysanthemum Tea
items.description: Sip on chrysanthemum tea—the plant, not the wild animal. Not sure how it works; maybe we pressed leaves or milked it. Enjoy the mystery!
